content.html: Inspired by @JamieTanna's blog, I've decided to resume writing. Here I explain it: manuelschmidt.net/jamie-tanna/ This is my blog: manuelschmidt.net Add me to your favorite feed reader or follow me here on Twitter, on Mastodon (hachyderm.io/@mschm) or on LinkedIn.
